## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My code generates no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed console.logs and debugging code

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc/docstrings
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers (if frontend change)
- [ ] I have tested on different screen sizes (if UI change)

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have checked that my changes don't introduce new dependencies unnecessarily
- [ ] If new dependencies were added, I have justified them in this PR
- [ ] I have updated requirements.txt / package.json if needed

### Security
- [ ] I have considered security implications of my changes
- [ ] I have not introduced any security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not exposed any sensitive information

### Performance
- [ ] I have considered performance implications
- [ ] My changes do not negatively impact performance
- [ ] I have optimized where possible
